decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eea70bf3-7fff-9301-c662-ce204648b169"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">A Demolition and Construction Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to the commencement of the development hereby approved (note that the Plan will be considered by the Council in consultation with TfL), and the development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved Plan.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eea70bf3-7fff-9301-c662-ce204648b169"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that the development minimises potential disruption to the local transport network and to local residents and businesses.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eea70bf3-7fff-9301-c662-ce204648b169"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p>A Servicing and Deliveries Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to first occupation of the development hereby approved (note that the Plan will be considered in consultation with TfL), and the development shall only be occupied in accordance with the approved Plan.</p><p>Reason: To ensure that the operation of the use hereby approved does not is disruption to the local transport network.</p><p><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-37d9804e-7fff-36a2-d4f5-3ffd58bfb469"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">No piling shall take place until a Piling Method Statement has been submitted to and approved by the Council (note that the Statement will be considered in consultation with Thames Water), and piling shall only take place in accordance with the approved Statement.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-37d9804e-7fff-36a2-d4f5-3ffd58bfb469"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that piling does not damage water utilities infrastructure nearby.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-37d9804e-7fff-36a2-d4f5-3ffd58bfb469"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d1f5d501-7fff-30e4-9d58-f54d3deb464f"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">A Refuse and Recycling Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to first occupation of the approved development, and the development shall only be occupied in accordance with the approved Plan.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d1f5d501-7fff-30e4-9d58-f54d3deb464f"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that the operation of the use hereby approved does not cause disruption to the local transport network.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d1f5d501-7fff-30e4-9d58-f54d3deb464f"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ea1b1ce4-7fff-8753-ab5c-dd4cc564ece6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The design details of the cycle parking facilities within the approved development shall be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the works, and the approved facilities shall be provided prior to the first occupation of the approved development.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ea1b1ce4-7fff-8753-ab5c-dd4cc564ece6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that cycle parking provision is adequate in the interests of the promotion of sustainable forms of transport.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ea1b1ce4-7fff-8753-ab5c-dd4cc564ece6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-193684d1-7fff-203a-f1cc-f14afa17aefe"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of swift and/or bat boxes for the building shall be submitted to and approved by the Council and and the approved swift and/or bat boxes shall be installed prior to first occupation.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-193684d1-7fff-203a-f1cc-f14afa17aefe"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure the development enhances local biodiversity.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-193684d1-7fff-203a-f1cc-f14afa17aefe"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9b253e81-7fff-041e-7b07-d10a406082a6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">External facing materials for the approved building works shall match the existing as closely as possible, unless indicated otherwise on the approved drawings.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9b253e81-7fff-041e-7b07-d10a406082a6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that the appearance of the building is satisfactory.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9b253e81-7fff-041e-7b07-d10a406082a6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b01829b5-7fff-610e-969e-2a19183772d1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of the surface treatment to replace the existing raised kerb area in front of the building, the new front entrance, the replacement courtyard entrance door, the bin store entrance door, and cycle store entrance door shall be approved before the relevant part of the works are commenced, and the development shall be completed in accordance with the approved details.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b01829b5-7fff-610e-969e-2a19183772d1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that these parts of the approved development are satisfactory.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b01829b5-7fff-610e-969e-2a19183772d1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ffee9daf-7fff-57b1-c24d-bab895e300c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Noise from all plant and machinery associated with the approved development shall at all times remain 5dB(A) below background levels when measured at any nearby sensitive location.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ffee9daf-7fff-57b1-c24d-bab895e300c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that plant and machinery does not result in a noise nuisance for nearby residential and business occupiers.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ffee9daf-7fff-57b1-c24d-bab895e300c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-aaa7a6ea-7fff-4498-cb43-174d3b6e970b"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The development shall be carried out and occupied in accordance with the approved SuDS and Energy &amp; Sustainability Assessment reports, and within 2 months of the first occupation of the approved development certification to show that BREEAM excellent rating achieved shall be submitted to and approved by the Council.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-aaa7a6ea-7fff-4498-cb43-174d3b6e970b"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that the sustainability credentials of the proposed development are satisfactory.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-aaa7a6ea-7fff-4498-cb43-174d3b6e970b"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span><br></p>

<p>The building shall only be occupied for purposes within Use E(g), which has replaced the previous Use Class B1, and for no other purposes within Use Class E, unless a separate planning permission or variation of condition is approved.</p><p>Reason: Other uses within Use Class E may be inappropriate in terms of their environmental, amenity or transport impact.</p><p><br></p>
description: The change of use including works of conversion of the existing part 4 part 5 storey building from residential (28 flats) to offices, erection of a 5 storey extension on the east elevation near the centre of the building and associated alterations, ground floor cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping works and installation of plant machinery and enclosure at roof level.
